Text:
I'm surprised nobody has thanked you for this wonderful book.But I'm pleased to be the first.
Your efforts and your book both are greatly appreciated.
Whenever I read this book,I'll be thanking you.
And yes...................A happy new year.
thanks a lot man! excelent book!

Thank you so much

I aced Chem throughout HS and College, chemistry is just something that really interested me I guess, and science in general because it explains how things work around us. Once you figure out how something works you can exploit it, take advantage of it...OR make it better, yes I have an engineering mind ;)
Like I wrote on the other torrent for this book, thank you thank you thank you! So glad I can put this book in my closet and save myself the back-break. Will seed as much as possible.
